description: For the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) <https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-651-78185>, the Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids to provide Qty [number] of Skid Steer and Compact Tracked Loaders, for delivery to CFB Gagetown, Borden, CFB Esquimalt, and CFB Halifax. The subject matter is municipal construction/ground excavation equipment which is associated with a variety of requests including ground excavation clean-up for much of that requested equipment.

full_summary:
================================

### Title

**Skid Steer and Compact Tracked Loaders**

**French Title:** *Chargeur à direction & Chargeur à chenille compact*

### Reference Number

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01005599
* **Amendment Number:** 0

### Publication Details

* **Solicitation Number:** W8476-236646/A
* **Publication Date:** August 30, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 14, 2022 at 14:00:00
* **Notice Type:** Request for Supply Arrangement (Open bidding)

### Project Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids from suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-19BCKH for the procurement of:

* Qty 1x Skid Steer and Compact Tracked Loaders, Configuration 2D and ILS deliverables for delivery to CFB Gagetown
* Qty 2x Skid Steer and Compact Tracked Loaders, Configuration 3B and ILS deliverables for delivery to Borden
* Qty 1x Skid Steer and Compact Tracked Loaders, Configuration 3B and ILS deliverables for delivery to CFB Esquimalt
* Qty 1x Skid Steer and Compact Tracked Loaders, Configuration 3A and ILS deliverables for delivery to CFB Halifax

### Tender Requirements

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **End User Entities:** Department of National Defence
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
* **Trade Agreements:** Various trade agreements, including Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* **Solicitation Requirements:** Supplier must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-19BCKH
* **Document Submission:** Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
* **Security Requirement:** No security requirement associated with this requirement

### Point of Contact

* **Contact Person:** Genevieve Roach
* **Email:** genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** 819-743-1902
* **Address:** 45 Sacre Coeur, Gatineau, Quebec,
